short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Onboardroom can share your contents with others.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Onboardroom is a video-based sales solution. (https://www.onboardroom.com/)

The main functions of onboardroom are as follows. 
1) Interactive Video: Lower psychological barriers and increase engagement by sharing personalized videos with your audience.
2) Data-based analysis: Analyze views, playback times, clicks, etc. in real time to understand customer reactions.
3) Easy integration: Integration with CRM, messenger, etc. enables efficient sales management.

Using this Chrome extension, you can automatically create an onboardroom share link on everyone's LinkedIn profile page and send them a message.

1) In the pop-up, enter the API Token issued from onboardroom.
2) When you click the bottom button, a modal will appear.
3) Select the sharing link created in onboardroom.
4) When you press the submit button, a share link is created and a message is prepared to be sent to the user.
